id.description: The unique identifier of the channel tab.

groupId.description: The unique identifier of the group the channel belongs to.

channelId.description: The unique identifier of the channel to which the tab belongs.

displayName.description: The display name of the channel tab.

webUrl.description: The URL of the web page linked to by the tab.

sortOrderIndex.description: The index used to determine the order of tabs within a channel.

teamsApp.description: Information related to the Microsoft Teams app associated with the channel tab

id.description: The unique identifier of the Microsoft Teams app.

displayName.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams app.

distributionMethod.description: The method used to distribute the app.

configuration.description: Details about the configuration settings for the channel tab

entityId.description: The unique identifier representing the content entity.

contentUrl.description: The URL to the content displayed in the tab.

removeUrl.description: The URL used to remove the tab.

websiteUrl.description: The URL of the associated website for the tab.

wikiTabId.description: The unique identifier of the tab in a wiki.

wikiDefaultTab.description: Boolean flag indicating if this is the default tab in a wiki.

hasContent.description: Boolean flag indicating if the tab has content.
